mapper.sql: g_id, g_name, g_price, g_agio, g_spec, tenant_sid, g_market_price, g_stock, g_sale_count, g_sale, g_hot, g_best, g_news, gt_id, g_desc, g_flag, g_createTime, g_image, g_thums, format_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_goods (g_id, g_name, g_price, g_agio, g_spec, tenant_sid, g_market_price, g_stock, g_sale_count, g_sale, g_hot, g_best, g_news, gt_id, g_desc, g_flag, g_createTime, g_image, g_thums, format_id) values (#{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gAgio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gMarketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gSaleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gHot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gBest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gNews,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gThums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formatId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_goods
g_id = #{record.gId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_name = #{record.gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
g_price = #{record.gPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
g_agio = #{record.gAgio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

g_name = #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
g_price = #{gPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update t_goods set g_name = #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_price = #{gPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, g_agio = #{gAgio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_spec = #{gSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_sid = #{tenantSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_market_price = #{gMarketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, g_stock = #{gStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_sale_count = #{gSaleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_sale = #{gSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_hot = #{gHot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_best = #{gBest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_news = #{gNews,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gt_id = #{gtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_desc = #{gDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_flag = #{gFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_createTime = #{gCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, g_image = #{gImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_thums = #{gThums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, format_id = #{formatId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where g_id = #{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select g.* from t_goods g left join t_gtype t on g.gt_id=t.gt_id left join t_worldtype w on t.wot_id = w.wot_id where g.g_news='是' limit 10
select g.* from t_goods g left join t_gtype t on g.gt_id=t.gt_id left join t_worldtype w on t.wot_id = w.wot_id where g.g_best='是' limit 10
